description: Allows for the control of the robot cleaner state.

supportedRobotCleanerStates.description: The states supported by the Robot Cleaner

setRobotCleanerCleaningState.description: Set the cleaning state of the Robot Cleaner

schedule.description: A value to which the Robot Cleaner control state should be set to
